t: Brand Registry Roles | Amazon & Marketplace SOPs
s: Once you enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry, you are assigned the role of Rights Owner and Administrator. As such, you can add users and assign roles to help manage your brand. Different roles enable varying access to tools within Brand Registry.
